reg_info.act_under: Retail Business Holidays Act   Loi sur les jours fériés dans le commerce de détail

content.content: 1. The time period prescribed under subsection 4.3 (9) of the Act is ninety days from the filing of the notice of appeal. O. Reg. 730/91, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The time period prescribed under subsection 4.3 (9) of the Act is ninety days from the filing of the notice of appeal. O. Reg. 730/91, s. 1.
